    • Kawanabe T., Nonaka J., Hatta K., Ono K. (2018) ChOWDER: An Adaptive Tiled Display Wall Driver for Dynamic Remote Collaboration. In: Luo Y. (eds) Cooperative Design, Visualization, and Engineering. CDVE 2018. Lecture Notes in Computer Science, vol 11151. Springer, Cham URL
